options.systemMessage:
You are the **Binance 1-Day Technical Indicator Agent**, responsible for calculating and returning **1-day interval signals** for any Binance Spot Market pair. You help detect major trend shifts, long-term support/resistance, and macro market behavior.

---

### üîó Connected Tools (via internal workflow)

You call the following indicators using `https://treasurium.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/1d-indicators`:

* **RSI** (14-period)
* **MACD** (12/26/9 config)
* **Bollinger Bands** (20-period, 2√óSTD)
* **SMA** (20-period)
* **EMA** (20-period)
* **ADX** (14-period with DI+ and DI‚àí)

---

### üì• Expected Input Format

```json
{
  "message": "SOLUSDT",
  "sessionId": "telegram_chat_id"
}
```

* `message`: A valid Binance Spot Market symbol (e.g., SOLUSDT, MATICUSDT)
* `sessionId`: For preserving user context and session-based replies

---

### üìä Behavior

* Sends POST request to:

  ```
  https://treasurium.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/1d-indicators
  ```

  with:

  ```json
  {
    "symbol": "SOLUSDT"
  }
  ```

* Retrieves **at least 40 daily candles** via Binance API

* Calculates and merges results from all indicators listed above

* Returns a single unified array for downstream agent interpretation

---

### üß† Use Case Scenarios

* Identify **long-term market sentiment and trend shifts**
* Support **macro trade setups** or high-confidence swing positions
* Anchor **support/resistance levels** across multi-timeframe views
* Feed **Financial Analyst Tool** and **Quant AI Agent** with base trend orientation

---

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Operational Notes

* Validate that the symbol is correctly formatted (uppercase, no typos)
* Ensure Binance returns sufficient 1d candles (fallback if not)
* Timestamp consistency is required across indicators
* Return all calculated metrics in structured JSON format with labels

parameters.content:
## Workflow Trigger
Node: When Executed by Another Workflow
This workflow does not start on its own ‚Äî it is always triggered by:

**Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool**

**Binance Quant AI Agent**

## Main Reasoning Agent
Node: **Binance SM 1day Indicators Agent**

You calculate daily **RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SMA, EMA, and ADX** for any Binance symbol. Your goal is to **detect macro sentiment, support/resistance zones, and long-term trend setups**.

##   OpenAI Chat Model
Node: OpenAI Chat Model
Model: **gpt-4.1-mini**
This node interprets:

Whether the trend is **forming, consolidating, or reversing**

Tags like **"Bearish Reversal", "Momentum Building"**, etc.

Telegram-ready summaries

## Session Memory
Node: **Simple Memory
Stores sessionId, symbol, and last-used indicators** for tracking across multi-timeframe reports.

## 1D Indicator Tool Call
Node: HTTP Request 1d Indicators Tool

**Sends a POST request to:**


https://treasurium.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/1d-indicators

Payload:

json
{
  "symbol": "SOLUSDT"
}
Calculates:

**RSI (14)

MACD (12,26,9)

Bollinger Bands (20/2)

SMA / EMA (20)

ADX (14 +DI/‚àíDI)**

Uses the latest **40 candles** of 1-day interval data from **Binance**.

# üóìÔ∏è Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool ‚Äì Documentation

This workflow acts as the macro-trend analysis unit of the Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent. It calculates long-term indicators using 1-day candles and identifies major trend reversals, support zones, and macro structure.

---

## üéØ Purpose

* Retrieve 1-day OHLCV data for any Binance trading pair (last 40 candles)
* Calculate daily indicators: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, ADX, SMA, EMA
* Send all raw indicator outputs to GPT for interpretation
* Return high-confidence macro trend assessment, formatted for Telegram or AI reasoning layers

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Core Workflow Components

| Node Name                           | Function                                                         |
| ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `When Executed by Another Workflow` | Trigger (activated by Quant AI Agent or Financial Analyst Tool)  |
| `Binance SM 1day Indicators Agent`  | Main logic agent for input routing and tool coordination         |
| `HTTP Request 1d Indicators Tool`   | Calls webhook for real indicator calculations                    |
| `OpenAI Chat Model (gpt-4.1-mini)`  | Interprets numerical outputs into human-readable trading signals |
| `Simple Memory`                     | Tracks symbol and session context                                |

---

## üì• Input Format

```json
{
  "message": "MATICUSDT",
  "sessionId": "telegram_chat_id"
}
```

* `message`: Target Binance Spot Market symbol (uppercase)
* `sessionId`: Used to track Telegram conversations and agent memory

---

## üß† Calculated Indicators

| Indicator      | Details                            |
| -------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| RSI (14)       | Identifies overbought/oversold     |
| MACD (12,26,9) | Detects trend shifts and momentum  |
| BBANDS (20, 2) | Volatility squeeze or expansion    |
| SMA (20)       | Macro trend support/resistance     |
| EMA (20)       | Faster-moving confirmation layer   |
| ADX (14)       | Strength of trend (includes DI+/-) |

Webhook endpoint:

```
POST https://treasurium.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/1d-indicators
```

Payload:

```json
{
  "symbol": "MATICUSDT"
}
```

---

## üì§ GPT Output Format Example

```
üìÖ 1D Overview ‚Äì MATICUSDT

‚Ä¢ RSI: 71 ‚Üí Overbought  
‚Ä¢ MACD: Bearish Cross forming  
‚Ä¢ BBANDS: Widening Volatility  
‚Ä¢ EMA < SMA ‚Üí Downtrend Momentum  
‚Ä¢ ADX: 33 ‚Üí High Trend Strength
```

---

## üìä Use Case Scenarios

| Scenario                                 | Behavior                                                    |
| ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| Swing trader requests long-term trend    | Output highlights multi-day reversal or continuation setups |
| Agent confirms bias before entry         | Used in conjunction with 15m‚Äì4h for confidence stacking     |
| Analyst wants sentiment-free macro trend | This tool uses price structure only (no news input)         |

---

## üì¶ Setup Instructions

### 1. Import Workflow

* Upload JSON into your n8n project
* Rename for clarity if needed

### 2. Configure GPT + Webhook

* Ensure OpenAI API key is linked to GPT node
* Confirm webhook `/1d-indicators` is active and functional

### 3. Link Parent Workflows

* This tool must be called by:

  * `Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool`
  * `Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent`

---

## üßæ Output Channel

* This tool is not user-facing
* Sends formatted summaries and structured arrays back to the calling agent

---

## üîê Licensing & Support
